Simple Theme & Include Sidebar

Posted on Thursday, November 10, 2005

I'm releasing my theme, I've almost completely finished porting it from Wordpress. The file linked here will always be the latest released version, right now I still need to add a few styles (comments things) and make sure all the views are how I want them. Theme requires Typo 2.5.8. I am also going to link up my "Include" sidebar module thingymambober. I made this so I could include my picture on the side, I'm going to make another that will be ajaxified. Basically it will reload the included file on a set delay (configurable in the admin area). Fun fun!
